page.title: 01 Around Ulcombe.
page.content: I've lived in Ulcombe about 9 years. The best thing when you walk out of the door,is that you know beauty is around you. The humming of the bees, the sweet sound that the birds in the {beautiful green trees}make and the most beautiful thing of all is the smell of the country side. There is mainly{farmland}rather than roads. Crops grown are rape seed ,barley,corn and wheat as well as cherry and apple{orchards.}There are also a lot of animals like horses and dogs and also grazing land with sheep and cows.One of the special features is the lovely footpaths. In spring there are beautiful blossoms in the orchards;in summer the beautiful leaves and trees with the wild flowers and the corn starting to get high.
